name: Digital 1
description: Based in Minneapolis, our true passion is helping our clients grow and protect their businesses through Inbound Marketing and WordPress security. Your goals are our goals and we are constantly striving not only to meet, but exceed your expectations. Our Mission: To empower small and medium sized businesses through inbound marketing and WordPress Security. We want to be the best investment that you make in your business everyday and this is at the core of everything we do.
